text: Cullowhee "Talk Like a Tarheel" , from the North Carolina Collection website at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Retrieved 2013-01-29. is a census-designated place (CDP) in Jackson County, North Carolina, United States. It is located on the Tuckasegee River. 7,682 people lived here as of the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in North Carolina
title: Cullowhee, North Carolina
